about_the_game:
Wrapturous Adventure (A Yuri BDSM-themed Game) is a grid-based adventure game with light stealth and puzzle elements. You take control of a tomb raider named Yui, who made the mistake of trying to steal an ancient Egyptian tomb that is still inhabited by a Pharaoh and her obedient lackeys. Now stripped, bound and gagged as an Egyptian mummy, Yui is left with only the ability to hop, leap and squat her way through the tomb and its many perils. Can you help her escape this kinky adventure despite her awkward limitations... Or do you even want to?

PLAY THE GAME CENSORED OR UNCENSORED


If you need footage for a video or stream of the game, or you're someone that likes BDSM but not nudity or sexual content you can enable censored mode in the settings at any time.

ENDURE THE PUNISHMENTS


Help Yui resist the pleasures of the punishments she'll receive after being captured by the Pharaoh and her obedient lackeys - Or don't, if you want Yui to succumb. But it'll be Game Over for you!

COLLECT THE SANITY OF PAST ADVENTURES


Just reaching the exit isn't enough - Throughout the levels are floating orbs containing the sanity of past adventurers. Collecting half of them opens the exit door, so you'll be required to take risks! Plus, if you can collect and hold onto them, you may be in for a reward!

WITNESS THE KINKY MEMORIES OF OTHERS


Find and interact with beautiful ladies that came before you and are now enjoying their new immortal lives as the Pharaoh's playthings. Give them some of their sanity back and witness their last punishment before succumbing to the Pharaoh.

OUT-HOP THE PHAROAH AND HER LACKEYS


Near the end of each chapter you'll be confronted by the ruler of the chamber. Luckily for you they like to play with their food first, so do your best to out-hop them in boss chase style levels!

ADDITIONAL GAME FEATURES

  • Character sprites presented with hand-drawn frame-by-frame animation.
  • View some rooms in 90 degree rotations to get a better view of the environment.
  • Avoid and endure 20+ obstacles, 5+ enemies, and puzzle/mini-games.
  • 6 different chambers with 2-3 levels each, all with different themes to explore.
  • Visual novel-style cutscenes of a bizarre and kinky story.
  • Multiple endings to unlock depending on your actions throughout the game.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains adult themes and content that may not be suitable for all ages. All characters in this title are 21 years of age and above!

The themes in this game include:
- Dubious consent, sexual activities involving BDSM (Bondage & Discipline, Dominance & Submission, Sadism & Masochism), and other fantasy kinks or fetishes.
- Full female nudity throughout the entire game (the game features a censored mode).
- Some strong language, alcohol, and drug use (fantasy items).

Wrapturous Adventure (A Yuri BDSM-themed Game) is a grid-based adventure game with light stealth and puzzle elements. You take control of a tomb raider named Yui, who made the mistake of trying to steal an ancient Egyptian tomb that is still inhabited by a Pharaoh and her obedient lackeys. Now stripped, bound and gagged as an Egyptian mummy, Yui is left with only the ability to hop, leap and squat her way through the tomb and its many perils. name: Wrapturous Adventure (A Yuri BDSM-Theme Game)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7+ (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100, AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760, AMD Radeon HD 7950
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7+ (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K or AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: A BDSM-themed stealth/puzzle adventure where you control a treasure hunter named Yui who has been captured and restrained after attempting to rob a long lost Egyptian tomb. Help Yui solve puzzles, avoid the Pharaoh and her lackeys, and try to escape the tomb... All while completely Wrapped Up!
